CustomField.description: This field is used to pull the Font Awesome icon associated with a given data type.
CustomField.formula: IF( ampi__Data_Type__c = 'Number', 'vi-number-value' , IF( ampi__Data_Type__c = 'Currency' , 'vi-money', IF( ampi__Data_Type__c = 'Percent' , 'vi-percentage-value' , IF( ampi__Data_Type__c = 'Qualitative' ,'vi-file-text-o' , IF( ampi__Data_Type__c = 'Milestone' , 'vi-map-signs' ,'' )))))&"#"&ampi__Data_Type__c
CustomField.label: Data Type
